law.catch_line: Merger of domestic limited partnerships with domestic or foreign limited partnerships, limited liability companies, or corporations.
law.history: Repeal the prior repeal contained in 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, which was to have been effective January 1, 2008, 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 180, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 239, effective January 1, 2008. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 389, sec. 112, effective July 15, 1994.
